question: Who stated that, "I believe that the most defensible an attractive form of democracy is one in which citizens can participate in decision-making in a wide array of spheres.”
explanation: It was David Held who stated that, "“I believe that the most defensible and attractive form of democracy is one i which citizens can participate in decision-making in a wide array of spheres” because the initial form of democracy included the free and adult males of the city states which was the purest form of democracy.
